theCatGirl:Parry.NAME: Parry
theCatGirl:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Evade.

theCatGirl:PlayAround.NAME: Play Around
theCatGirl:PlayAround.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and applies !M! stacks of Striken.

theCatGirl:ElegantStrike.NAME: Elegant Strike
theCatGirl:ElegantStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Evade you have. NL ( !D! Damage). NL Exhaust.
theCatGirl:ElegantStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Evade you have. NL ( !D! Damage).

theCatGirl:AllIn.NAME: All In
theCatGirl:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable.

theCatGirl:FocusedStrike.NAME: Focused Strike
theCatGirl:FocusedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If you have Evade, gain !M! [E].

theCatGirl:QuickStrike.NAME: Quick Strike
theCatGirl:QuickStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card.

theCatGirl:PoisedStrike.NAME: Poised Strike
theCatGirl:PoisedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a random Skill in your hand for the rest of the combat.
theCatGirl:PoisedStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade all Skills in your hand for the rest of the combat.

theCatGirl:DefensiveStance.NAME: Defensive Stance
theCatGirl:DefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Evade. NL Permanently increase this card's Evade by !theCatGirl:SecondMagic!. NL Exhaust.

theCatGirl:TwoStep.NAME: Two-Step
theCatGirl:TwoStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !M! Evade.

theCatGirl:AdaptivePacing.NAME: Adaptive Pacing
theCatGirl:AdaptivePacing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce this card's cost by !M! this combat.

theCatGirl:Prepared.NAME: Prepared
theCatGirl:Prepared.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Skill is played twice.
theCatGirl:Prepared.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Skills are played twice.

theCatGirl:EmergencyParry.NAME: Emergency Parry
theCatGirl:EmergencyParry.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your Evade. NL Lose all Evade.
theCatGirl:EmergencyParry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to !M! times your Evade. NL Lose all Evade.

theCatGirl:ChangeOfPlans.NAME: Change Of Plans
theCatGirl:ChangeOfPlans.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Put a card from your hand to the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
theCatGirl:ChangeOfPlans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Put a card from your hand to the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theCatGirl:KeepAlert.NAME: Keep Alert
theCatGirl:KeepAlert.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Evade. NL Evade is not lost at the end of this turn.

theCatGirl:AdventurersInsight.NAME: Adventurer's Insight
theCatGirl:AdventurersInsight.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would gain Evade, gain !M! more.
theCatGirl:AdventurersInsight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you would gain Evade, gain !M! more.

theCatGirl:PoiseStance.NAME: Poise Stance
theCatGirl:PoiseStance.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Evade.

theCatGirl:Counterattack.NAME: Counterattack
theCatGirl:Counterattack.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Evade, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

theCatGirl:Beastification.NAME: Beastification
theCatGirl:Beastification.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !theCatGirl:SecondMagic! Dexterity. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, lose [E] [E].

theCatGirl:AngryForm.NAME: Angry Form
theCatGirl:AngryForm.DESCRIPTION: Evade will increase your damage by 2 times the Evade amount. NL Evade will not increase Block anymore.
theCatGirl:AngryForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Evade will increase your damage by 2 times the Evade amount. NL Evade will not increase Block anymore.

theCatGirl:BleedingWounds.NAME: Bleeding Wounds
theCatGirl:BleedingWounds.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Poison.

theCatGirl:BloodBath.NAME: Blood Bath
theCatGirl:BloodBath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, deal !M! damage again to a random enemy.

theCatGirl:BloodScent.NAME: Blood Scent
theCatGirl:BloodScent.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Lose all Block. NL Lose all Evade.

theCatGirl:BloodyClaws.NAME: Bloody Claws
theCatGirl:BloodyClaws.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Heal HP equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.

theCatGirl:Claws.NAME: Claws
theCatGirl:Claws.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy and applies !M! stacks of Gash.

theCatGirl:ClawScratch.NAME: Claw Scratch
theCatGirl:ClawScratch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Attack played this turn.

theCatGirl:ComboAttack.NAME: Combo Attack
theCatGirl:ComboAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL If it is an Attack, play it. Otherwise, discard it.

theCatGirl:Enrage.NAME: Enrage
theCatGirl:Enrage.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy for each Attack played this turn.

theCatGirl:ExtremeSpeed.NAME: Extreme Speed
theCatGirl:ExtremeSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have at least !M! Evade, lose !M! Evade and draw a card.

theCatGirl:FinishingMove.NAME: Finishing Move
theCatGirl:FinishingMove.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has less than !M! %HP, deal !theCatGirl:SecondMagic! damage instead.

theCatGirl:Growl.NAME: Growl
theCatGirl:Growl.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy !M! times.

theCatGirl:HungerClaw.NAME: Hunger Claw
theCatGirl:HungerClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the enemy with the most stacks of Gash. NL If this kills a non-minion enemy, raise your Max HP by !M!. NL Exhaust.

theCatGirl:Insane.NAME: Insane
theCatGirl:Insane.DESCRIPTION: Fetch all cards from exhaust pile, they cost !M! this turn. NL Exhaust.

theCatGirl:RageClaws.NAME: Rage Claws
theCatGirl:RageClaws.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

theCatGirl:ScratchFlurry.NAME: Scratch Flurry
theCatGirl:ScratchFlurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 3 cards and discard all cards drawn this way that are not claws.

theCatGirl:SevenLives.NAME: Seven Lives
theCatGirl:SevenLives.DESCRIPTION: Ignore the next attack that would deal damage to you, gain that much Evade instead. NL Exhaust.
theCatGirl:SevenLives.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ignore the next !M! attacks that would deal damage to you, gain that much Evade instead. Multi-hits attacks are counted as a single attack, but will remove multiple stacks. NL Exhaust.

theCatGirl:SmellFear.NAME: Smell Fear
theCatGirl:SmellFear.DESCRIPTION: If the target does not intend to Attack, gain !M! Strength.

theCatGirl:Stalk.NAME: Stalk
theCatGirl:Stalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to !B! times the number of debuffs ALL enemies have.
theCatGirl:Stalk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to !B! times the number of debuffs ALL enemies have, plus 4 Block.

theCatGirl:UnrelentingAssault.NAME: Unrelenting Assault
theCatGirl:UnrelentingAssault.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Deal !D! damage for each Attack drawn this way.

theCatGirl:AccidentalSlap.NAME: Accidental Slap
theCatGirl:AccidentalSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the number of cards discarded this combat.

theCatGirl:BodyBlow.NAME: Body Blow
theCatGirl:BodyBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Discard 1 card at random.

theCatGirl:FumblingBlow.NAME: Fumbling Blow
theCatGirl:FumblingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL Clumsy: Deal !M! damage. NL Draw a card.

theCatGirl:LuckyBlow.NAME: Lucky Blow
theCatGirl:LuckyBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have discarded a card this turn, this card damage is increased by !M!.

theCatGirl:Misfire.NAME: Misfire
theCatGirl:Misfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Discard 1 card.

theCatGirl:RecoveryBlow.NAME: Recovery Blow
theCatGirl:RecoveryBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card for each Stumble on your hand.

theCatGirl:RunningWithDaggers.NAME: Running With Daggers
theCatGirl:RunningWithDaggers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have discarded a card this turn, NL gain [E] [E].

theCatGirl:TripLunge.NAME: Trip Lunge
theCatGirl:TripLunge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 Stumble into your hand.

theCatGirl:TryingMyBest.NAME: Trying My Best
theCatGirl:TryingMyBest.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Deal !D! for every Attack and Stumble discarded this way.

theCatGirl:AccidentalHeadbutt.NAME: Accidental Headbutt
theCatGirl:AccidentalHeadbutt.DESCRIPTION: Stuns the enemy and ends your turn. Gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.

theCatGirl:DecliningDefenses.NAME: Declining Defenses
theCatGirl:DecliningDefenses.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Decrease this card's Block by 1 this combat. NL Clumsy: Gain !M! Block.

theCatGirl:LearnByMistake.NAME: Learn By Mistake
theCatGirl:LearnByMistake.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.
theCatGirl:LearnByMistake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile +3.

theCatGirl:Meow.NAME: Meow
theCatGirl:Meow.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

theCatGirl:Slip.NAME: Slip
theCatGirl:Slip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Evade. NL Discard 1 card. NL Add 1 Stumble into your hand.

theCatGirl:Stumble.NAME: Stumble
theCatGirl:Stumble.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust on discard. NL Clumsy: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

theCatGirl:ThatWasntIt.NAME: That Wasn't It
theCatGirl:ThatWasntIt.DESCRIPTION: Place a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

theCatGirl:TrainWreck.NAME: Train Wreck
theCatGirl:TrainWreck.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

theCatGirl:GoddessOfMisfortune.NAME: Goddess Of Misfortune
theCatGirl:GoddessOfMisfortune.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 Stumble into your hand.
theCatGirl:GoddessOfMisfortune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add 1 Stumble into your hand.

theCatGirl:NeverGivingUp.NAME: Never Giving Up
theCatGirl:NeverGivingUp.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card, deals !M! damage to a random enemy.
theCatGirl:NeverGivingUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you discard a card, deals !M! damage to a random enemy.

theCatGirl:PilingErrors.NAME: Piling Errors
theCatGirl:PilingErrors.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All Stumbles Retain. NL Stumbles can now be played for 1 [E]. Whenever you play a Stumble, Exhaust it.

theCatGirl:ShockedWitness.NAME: Shocked Witness
theCatGirl:ShockedWitness.DESCRIPTION: The first time you Exhaust a card during your turn, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

theCatGirl:CatGirlUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theCatGirl:CatGirlUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. NL Affected by Block modifiers.

theCatGirl:CatGirlRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theCatGirl:CatGirlRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies twice.
theCatGirl:CatGirlRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies 3 times.

theCatGirl:CatGirlRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theCatGirl:CatGirlRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theCatGirl:CatGirlAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theCatGirl:CatGirlAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theCatGirl:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)
